description:
Property Location: Located in Coimbatore, The Residency Towers Coimbatore is a 2-minute drive from Gedee Car Museum and 5 minutes from Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple. This 5-star hotel is 1.9 mi (3 km) from PSG College of Technology and 3.8 mi (6.1 km) from Tidel Park Coimbatore IT SEZ.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 135 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LED televisions. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wired Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Amenities: Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining: Grab a bite at The Edition, one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Coimbatore? This hotel has 3800 square feet (353 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).

Located opposite the railway station, Grand Plaza, Coimbatore is a family owned hotel with a home like ambience. Elegant settings and gratifying hospitality are beautifully complemented by the string of contemporary amenities offered by the hotel. The well- designed rooms exude a distinct sense of warmth while the equipped conference hall is ideal for hosting corporate events. Location: Grand Plaza is located on the Geetha Hall Road, a bustling area of the city. VOC Park/Zoo (Approx. 2km) and St. Michael's Church (Approx. 2km) are the places of visit that surround the hotel. Though Coimbatore is known for the temples and churches, it also houses some other exciting places. Gass Forest Museum, Kasthuri Sreenivasan Trust Art Gallery and Textile Museum as well as Selva Chinthamani Kulam, a water tank, are some of the places worth-visiting. Distance from Coimbatore Railway station: Approx. 2km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 10km Hotel Features: The hotel has conference as well as a banquet hall which are perfect venues for social gatherings and corporate events. The hotel also provides currency exchange services for added convenience. Internet, business center, laundry, parking, travel desk and doctor on call are the various basic services offered. Catering services, concierge, non-smoking rooms and lounge are some of the additional features. "Hotpot", the multi-cuisine restaurant churns delightful dishes from Indian and Chinese cuisines, while "Jungle Bar", a well-stocked bar contains an exotic range of spirits. Rooms: Guests can lodge in business class rooms and executive class rooms. Elegance, functionality and warmth define the essence of the rooms in Grand Plaza. These air-conditioned rooms are aptly furnished and equipped with a vast range of amenities like internet access, iron, mini bar, refrigerator, safe and telephone. Flat-screen TV, parallel phone line in bathroom, tea/coffee maker, turn down service and writing desk are the other in-room features.

Property Location: With a stay at Metro Park Inn in Coimbatore (Town Hall), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple and Gedee Car Museum. This hotel is 3.3 mi (5.4 km) from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University and 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from PSG College of Technology.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities: Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free valet parking is available onsite.

Hotel Sree Murugan, Coimbatore, is synonymous with gratifying hospitality, impeccable services and an unparalleled sense of warmth. The hotel greets its guests with a gamut of amenities and splendidly appointed rooms. With a range of culinary delights as well as spaces for social & corporate gatherings, this hotel is a preferred choice for business and leisure guests alike. Location: Hotel Sree Murugan is located at 56, Devi & Co. Lane, quite close to the railway station. Places of visit like the CSI Christ Church (Approx. 1km) and Sri Saradambal Temple (Approx. 3km) can be easily accessed from the hotel. The city houses many religious places of visit. Athar Jamath Majeed, built by perfume merchants in the ancient days is one of the oldest mosques in the city, while the Koniamman temple is a beautiful 13th century temple constructed by "Irula" community. Distance from Coimbatore Railway station: Approx. 2km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 11km Hotel Features: Hotel Sree Murugan provides an array of necessary services such as internet, laundry, parking, travel desk and doctor on call. Lounge, car rental and business services are some of the other additional features that can be availed by the guests. Arrangements for corporate events can also be made in the well-equipped conference hall. The hotel's very own restaurant sports an elegant decor and serves a delectable range of Chinese, Tandoori & South Indian cuisines, whereas the electrifying Pub is the ideal place for merry making and sipping tantalising beverages. Rooms: The lodging options offered to the guests include deluxe non A/C rooms, junior suites, deluxe A/C rooms and royal triplet rooms. With an earthy feel and use of pastel shades, these rooms emanate ultimate comfort. Air conditioning, colour TV, internet, refrigerator, safe, telephone, tea/coffee maker, temp control and writing desk are the basic features that make the stay truly pleasant.

Property Location: A stay at Aloft Coimbatore Singanallur places you in the heart of Coimbatore, a 5-minute drive from Gedee Car Museum and 11 minutes from PSG College of Technology. This 4-star hotel is 4.6 mi (7.4 km) from Tidel Park Coimbatore IT SEZ and 5.2 mi (8.3 km) from Codissia Trade Fair Complex.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 167 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Amenities: Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a 24-hour health club and an outdoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining: Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is complimentary (available 24 hours).

Comfort Hotels, Coimbatore, offers a warm ambience to business and leisure travellers. With easy access to the sacred temples, railway station and corporate hubs, the elegantly decorated hotel attracts leisure as well as business travellers. Experience a comfortable stay at this centrally located hotel. Location: Comfort Hotels is located at D.B. road, R.S. Puram. Tamil Nadu Agriculture University (Approx. 2km) and Perur Siva Temple (Approx. 7km) are proximate places near the hotel. One of the prominent research institutions of South Asia, Tamil Nadu Agriculture University is well-connected by several modes of transport and its chief attraction is a botanical garden with various species of plants and flowers. Other interesting hotspots include Marudamalai Temple, Eachanari Vinayagar Temple and Parambikkulam Wildlife Sanctuary. Coimbatore International Airport: 13 km (approx.) Coimbatore Junction Railway Station: 3 km (approx.) Hotel Features: Guests can avail the basic services that include air conditioning, room service, front desk, travel desk, elevators, parking, security and doctor-on-call. The state-of-art business centre and conference facilities suffice the needs of business professionals. Plan social gatherings and events with the banqueting facilities at the hotel.The in-house restaurant, with a lovely setting, serves tasty vegetarian Indian delicacies. Rooms: Lodging options at the hotel include deluxe A/c and club rooms. The rooms are elegantly decorated with a pleasing decor. The cosy rooms offer a refreshing ambience after a hectic schedule. Essential amenities like air conditioning, colour television, safe and telephone ensure a delightful stay.

Property Location: Located in Coimbatore, Vivanta by Taj Surya is a 5-minute drive from Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple and 8 minutes from Gedee Car Museum. This 5-star hotel is 3.2 mi (5.2 km) from PSG College of Technology and 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 178 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Plasma televisions and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bathrobes. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities: Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include wired Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.

Hotel CAG Pride, Coimbatore is managed by CAG group of companies, which is known for its impeccable hospitality standards. The hotel was awarded Young Hotel Entrepreneur of the Year 2008 by Federation of Hotels & Restaurants Association of India. The innovative hotel exudes sophisticated elegance that cannot be missed. Its facilities and infrastructure match with the changing needs of today's lifestyle making it absolutely perfect for all travellers. Location: Hotel CAG Pride is located on 312 Bharathiyar Road, Coimbatore. The city is the fourth largest metropolis in South India and is the administrative capital of Coimbatore district. Places to visit that are proximate to the hotel are Ayyappan Temple (Approx. 1km) and Lourds Church (Approx. 1km). The pious Lourds Church started its first Sunday devotion from September 1949. People from neighbouring villages and cities gather in hundreds on the first Saturdays for worship. Other famous places to visit include Dhyanalinga Yogic Temple, Infant Jesus Church and Perur Patteeswara Swamy Temple. Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 3 km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 10 km Hotel Features: Hotel CAG Pride constantly keeps altering their services to provide guests with the best during the stay. It is equipped with all the modern amenities required without compromising on quality. Some of the basic amenities offered are in-house laundry, ample parking, money exchange, pick-up and drop facility and cab services. Guests can plan their journey through the travel desk facility provided by the hotel. For conducting business or social events, banquet/conference facility or boardroom is also provided by the hotel. Its well-equipped health club ensures guests do not have to miss-out on their work-out regimen. The in-house exclusive multi-cuisine restaurant and lounge bar are perfect avenues to chill-out with sumptuous delicacies and drinks. Rooms: Hotel CAG Pride offers a variety of accommodations, including executive rooms, studios and suites. All the rooms feature a modern decor, luxurious appeal and a calming ambience. Basic amenities such as tea/coffee kettle, LCD television, in-room safe and Wi-Fi access are provided. In addition, all the rooms have a mini-bar that is well-stocked.

Hotel Sriram International, Coimbatore is a welcoming hotel that strives to make the guests feel comfortable and at home. A destination of comfort and cordial hospitality, it caters to various segments, including leisure, corporate and transit travellers. The location is an added bonus as it is at a short distance from the Coimbatore railway station.

Hotel Sriram International is located at 18 & 19 State Bank Road, Coimbatore. Coimbatore, also known as Kovai, is the second largest metropolitan city in the state of Tamil Nadu. The city is located on the banks of the Noyyal River surrounded by the Western Ghats. Guest's can visit some religious places, including Mangala Vinagar Temple (Approx. 0.25 km) and Infant Jesus Church (Approx. 9 km). The church is located at Kovaipudur in the outskirts of Coimbatore. In addition, guests' can take a day's trip to visit the famous Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, Indira Gandhi Wildlife Sanctuary and Gass Museum.

Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 2 km
Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 10 km


Hotel Sriram International is a homely hotel with a spacious front lobby that is airy and luxurious. The hotel offers various amenities to make sure that the guests are comfortable. Basic amenities offered include room service, front desk, daily housekeeping, laundry, internet, parking and doctor-on-call. For convenience of business guests the hotel has a well-equipped business centre. The travel desk ensures that the travelling arrangements are done as per the needs of individual guests. Its spacious, well-decorated banquet hall is perfect for holding private functions or parties. For dining, the in-house restaurant is a great place.

At Hotel Sriram International, the rooms are spacious, comfortable and furnished with modern amenities. The room options offered are executive room and deluxe room. All rooms are equipped with refrigerator, colour television with multi channel system and 24-hrs hot and cold water supply.

Offering a unique blend of convenience and warmth, Hotel Raamus, Coimbatore is one of the most sought-after destinations in the city. Located downtown, this hotel is accessible from all the important locations in the city. The rooms are truly comforting, while the unparalleled services and gracious hospitality makes the stay memorable. Location: Situated on Davey & Company Lane, Hotel Raamus stands opposite the railway station. The hotel has tourist places like Sri Saradambal Temple (Approx. 3km) and Sri Selva Vinayagar Temple (Approx. 6km) in its vicinity. Gass Forest Museum, a Government run natural history museum and Lourds Church, a place with healing powers are some of the prominent places of visit in the city. Distance from Coimbatore Railway station: Approx. 3km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 11km Hotel Features: Hotel Raamus is a great option for leisure guests. The basic facilities offered are 24-hour front desk, laundry, parking, travel desk, 24-hour security and doctor on call. A mouth-watering range of North Indian and South Indian delicacies awaits guests at the in-house restaurant. Special request for occasional outdoor catering is also undertaken by the restaurant. The hotel also houses the Ramba bar, a cozy and relaxed place to enjoy drinks in the company of friends and family. Rooms: Standard Non A/C rooms and Standard A/C rooms are the accommodation options that can be availed by the guests. With simple styling and warm ambience, these air-conditioned rooms are specially designed to offer ultimate relaxation and comfort to the guests. All the rooms are provided with a balcony which offers spectacular views of Nilgiri at one end and the Western Ghats on the other. These rooms feature amenities like colour TV and telephone with direct dialling.

Hotel Naveen, Coimbatore, is a contemporary offering for all the discerning travellers. The new-age utilities, an ambience of subtle elegance and heart-warming hospitality define the essence of the hotel. The comfy rooms and the innate warmth truly invite guests for a relaxed stay, and its location near the vantage points makes the hotel even more desirable. Location: Hotel Naveen is located in Davey & Company Lane and offers quick access to the railway station. CSI Christ Church (Approx. 2km) and Athar Jamaath Masjid (Approx. 3km) are the places of visit that lie in the vicinity of the hotel. Ancient temples like Sri Saradambal temple and Koniamman temple must be visited by the guests. Victoria Town Hall, a landmark building in the city and VOC Park and Zoo, a major amusement centre are some of the other places worth exploring. Distance from Coimbatore Railway station: Approx. 2km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 11km Hotel Features: Hotel Naveen is a great place for corporate travellers. It has a well-equipped conference hall and business centre that take care of guests business needs. Internet, laundry, parking, concierge, doctor-on-call and travel desk are the various essential amenities that make the stay truly hassle-free. Rooms: The hotel offers non A/C and A/C rooms as accommodation option. All the rooms are done up in contemporary style while absolute functionality is ensured with a range of facilities. Various amenities provided are colour TV, telephone and writing desk which enhance the convenience factor.

Standing tall for more than 2 decades in the heart of the city, Hotel City Tower provides a high degree of comfort and convenience. Central location, cosy accommodation, and comprehensive business services make this an ideal choice for both business and leisure travellers. Sightseeing tours can be arranged at the travel desk. Tourist hotspots near the hotel include Black Thunder Water theme park (40km), Siruvani Waterfalls (35km), Maruthamalai Sri Subrahmanya Swamy Temple (14km), and Ooty (87km). Known for its understated luxury this 9 storey hotel offers both A.C. and non-A.C. rooms in different categories. 

In-room amenities like satellite television, internet access, mini-bar, writing desk and toiletries ensure a relaxed and comfortable stay for travellers. The roof-top garden restaurant Cloud 9 serves mouth-watering delicacies from Continental, Indian and Chinese platter. Orchard a multi-cuisine restaurant catering exclusively to pure vegetarian patrons serves scrumptious delicacies. Other services at the hotel include City Mahal, a conference hall that accommodates 200 people at a time.

Nahar Manchester Inn, Coimbatore is a great place for relaxation in the lap of peace and homely comfort. Located in the midst of the city, this hotel is equipped with a blend of business and leisure conveniences along with high-standards of hospitality. Its proximity to the city's attractions, shopping malls and commercial centres makes it even more desirable. Location: Nahar Manchester Inn is located at 1112 Thadagam Road, Coimbatore. The city is one of the fastest growing tier-II cities in India and a major industrial, commercial and educational hub of Tamil Nadu. Kumaraswamy Lake (Approx. 1km) and Selva Chinthamani Kulam (Approx. 2km) are close to the hotel. Selva Chinthamani Kulam is located within the city on north side of Perur road and east Selvapuram. Guests can also visit Vydehi Waterfalls, Narayana Kavi Memorial, Architectural Aazhiyaar Dam during their stay. Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 3 km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 12 km Hotel Features: Nahar Mancehster Inn is an economical place for tourists in the city of Coimbatore. It is a well-furnished hotel that provides all the amenities required for a convenient stay. Basic amenities provided are room service, daily housekeeping and Wi-Fi access. The travel desk takes care of all travel needs, including package tours for sightseeing. It has a well-designed banquet hall along with banqueting that accommodates up to 80 people and is perfect to hold receptions or conferences. Additionally, the hotel makes arrangement for pick-up and drop from airport and railway station as well. For dining, the hotel has a restaurant which serves delicious meals to all its guests. Rooms: The room options available at Nahar Manchester Inn include AC or non-AC deluxe suites and club class family suites. The rooms are simple and cosy with spacious beds and clean linens. These rooms are well-equipped to offer a hassle-free time and pleasurable experience.

Comfort Pearl Service Apartment, Coimbatore is the perfect solution for travellers on a long stay. The apartments are centrally located making it ideal for guests who come to Coimbatore for business. The luxurious apartments are crafted with excellence with ample amenities, homely feel and personalized services. Location: Comfort Pearl Service Apartment is located at 81 Ganesh Nagar, Coimbatore. It has easy access to all the major business and shopping areas. The city is one of the busiest and second largest metropolitan cities in Tamil Nadu. It is a fast growing city and has become a major textile, industrial, commercial and educational hub of the state. Guests can take a spiritual journey to the famous Saibaba Temple (Approx. 0.5km) and New Jerusalem Church (Approx. 6km) which are close to the hotel. Other places of interest are Monkey Falls, Ramar Temple and Kovai Kutralam Falls. Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 10 km Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 18 km (The distances mentioned are approximations and should not be considered as exact.) Hotel Features: Comfort Pearl Service Apartment is a great option for travellers who are looking for hassle-free comfort. The apartments are spacious and appropriately furnished. Some of the facilities offered include room service, 24-hr security, daily housekeeping, front desk and travel desk. Rooms: Comfort Pearl Service Apartment provides guests with two options namely, one bed room and two bed room. These apartments have a relaxing ambience and are designed with minimalistic style and elegant appeal. Amenities such as safety locker, LCD television, air-conditioning and well-equipped kitchen make the stay a convenient one.

Property Location: With a stay at Gokulam Park Coimbatore in Tirupur, you'll be near the airport and close to Kovai Medical Center and Hospital and Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Codissia Trade Fair Complex and Tidel Park Coimbatore IT SEZ.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 107 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries.

Amenities: Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and complimentary babysitting/childcare.

Dining: Stop by the hotel's restaurant, 24x7 Bytes, for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.

Offering a unique blend of convenience and warmth, Hotel Royal Castle Inn, Coimbatore, is one of the most sought after destinations in the city. With its tastefully designed rooms and impeccable personalised services, this hotel is the perfect abode of comfort. The location of the hotel near the vantage points further enhances its desirability. Location: Hotel Royal Castle Inn is located at 7th street Extn, Gandhipuram. Nearby places to visit from the hotel include Samayapurathu Maariamman temple (Approx. 0.25km) and Victoria Town Hall (Approx. 6km). Victoria Town Hall is part of the Coimbatore Corporation Administrative Buildings. It was built in 1882 in honour of Queen Victoria with stone and lime mortar. Other hotspots that must not be missed are Kovai Kutralam Falls,Vellingiri Hill temple and Anubhavi Subramaniar temple. Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 4kms Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 10kms Hotel Features: Hotel Royal Castle Inn makes the stay a convenient one with its range of features like room service, internet, 24-hour front desk support, air conditioning, elevators, parking, travel desk support, 24-hour security, a concierge and a doctor-on- call. Rooms: Deluxe rooms, executive rooms and suites are the options of accommodation offered to the guests during their stay. The subtle light and decor setting creates the perfect cosy ambience for the stay of the guests. Air conditioning, flat-screen TVs and a phone line are the in-room amenities provided to the guests.

Hotel Rathna Residency, Coimbatore, offers a fine stay with its impeccable services, gratifying hospitality and innate warmth. The hotel provides a unique experience of Indian hospitality that makes guests feel at home. This hotel is a great option for leisure travellers who are looking for something easily accessible. Location: Hotel Rathna Residency is located at Variety Hall road. Koniammam temple (Approx. 1km) and Masjid-e-Ahle Hadees (Approx. 1km) are the places of visit that lie in the vicinity of the hotel. Koniammam temple is one of the most beautiful temples, which houses a statue of 'Devi Koni Amman' in the style of 'Mahisasuramardhini'. Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, Indira Gandhi Wildlife Sanctuary and Forest College Museum are some of the other places worth- exploring. Distance from Coimbatore Railway Station: Approx. 0.10kms Distance from Coimbatore International Airport: Approx. 11kms Hotel Features: Hotel Rathna Residency features a blend of business and leisure facilities to make the stay perfect. A conference hall for corporate events like business meetings and related functions is offered. The hotel also provides guests with internet access, 24-hour front desk support, 24-hour room service and travel desk support for the convenience of its guests. The multi-cuisine restaurants serve a variety of delicious dishes in a relaxing ambience. 'Valayapatti - Chettinad Restaurant' offers delicious flavours of the famed Chettinad Cuisine of South India, while 'Fusion', a fine dining multi-cuisine restaurant, serves North Indian, Continental, Garhwali, Mughlai and Chinese food among their authentic delicacies. 'Palms' is an open air roof garden restaurant serving multi-cuisine food which includes Italian, Continental and Asian cuisines. Rooms: Accommodation is offered in the form of deluxe rooms and super deluxe rooms. All the rooms are done up in contemporary style while absolute functionality is ensured with a range of facilities like air conditioning, a colour television, internet access, a safe, a telephone and a tea/coffee maker.

Property Location: Located in Coimbatore, Hotel Prince Gardens is within a 15-minute drive of Gedee Car Museum and Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple. This hotel is 3 mi (4.8 km) from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University and 3 mi (4.8 km) from PSG College of Technology.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities: Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Free valet parking is available onsite.

Property Location: When you stay at The Arcadia in Coimbatore, you'll be connected to the convention center, within a 10-minute walk of Kovai Medical Center and Hospital and Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute. This 4-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Codissia Trade Fair Complex and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Tidel Park Coimbatore IT SEZ.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 31 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and LED televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities: Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

This hotel has 800 square feet (74 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.

Property Location: With a stay at Treebo ESS Grande in Coimbatore, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Gedee Car Museum and Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple. This hotel is 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from PSG College of Technology and 3 mi (4.8 km) from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities: This hotel offers designated smoking areas.

Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free self parking is available onsite.

Property Location: Located in Coimbatore, Sri Aarvee Hotels is within a 10-minute drive of Gedee Car Museum and Puliakulam Vinayagar Temple. This hotel is 2.7 mi (4.4 km) from PSG College of Technology and 3.8 mi (6.2 km) from Tamil Nadu Agricultural University.

Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 72 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

Amenities: Enjoy recreation amenities such as an attached winery or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 10 AM.

Business, Other Amenities: Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.

Hotel Soorya International, the best business hotel in Mettupalayam, at the gateway to Nilgiris. Conceived as an ideal retreat for leisure or vacation, our hotel offers a stay in the heart of Mettupalayam, enjoyment of the comfort of personalized service and well-equipped modern amenities. The aesthetic ambience, well-appointed guest rooms, and the delicious food are specially prepared to suit everyone.

Sri Murugan Residency, Coimbatore, is a well-maintained and contemporary property.
